Description
Feel like Abel from Street Fighter IV with this alternate singlet bottom! Wear it and you'll be "abel" to move more freely! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Abel de Street Fighter IV avec ce bas de costume alternatif ! Rien de plus confortable pour se battre ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen unteren Teil eines Ringertrikots wie Abel aus Street Fighter IV! Es bietet optimalen Tragekomfort! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Abel di Street Fighter IV con la parte sotto del costume alternativo! Imponiti sui tuoi nemici con questa tenuta in stile MMA. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este traje alternativo (p. inferior) y conviértete en Abel de Street Fighter IV! ¡El universo de MMA será tuyo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 アベルになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のシングレット （上） 動きやすさで差をつけろ！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 아벨이 되는 어렌지 ver. 도복(상의). 움직이기 편한 스타일입니다! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Abel from Street Fighter IV with this alternate singlet bottom! Wear it and you'll be "abel" to move more freely! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為Abel的運動服 (下)之特別版。以容易行動的優點顯示跟別人的不同吧！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
